com.algolia.instantsearch.core.helpers

Class QuerySuggestionsContentProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.ContentProvider
      • com.algolia.instantsearch.core.helpers.QuerySuggestionsContentProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2

    public abstract class QuerySuggestionsContentProvider
extends ContentProvider
    Provides Search Suggestions through a ContentProvider.

    Your subclass must provide initIndex() an index} and specify a limit.

      • shouldReturnHighlightResult

        protected boolean shouldReturnHighlightResult()
        If true, the suggestion will return the highlighting output to be used at display in your custom suggestionRowLayout. This value will be sent to its TextView identified as @android:id/text1 through setText.
